item.title: My understanding of PyTorch
item.description:
Yo,
This will be blog on my understanding on pytorch. I am following the official tutorial for the same.
First of all, let me tell you that I took two days to finish the 60 minute blitz. To be honest, I was distracted and had other work too. And Soumith Chintala has explained it in the best possible way. I loved the tutorial and now I feel like I can start off a new project with PyTorch without any fear.
item.dc:creator: Bhaskar C

item.title: My first post
item.description: This is the first post from my Pelican blog. YAY!
